<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Enumerate all string patches and write them into the destination section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Order of patches is the same as in original input file. To avoid emitting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same string twice we accumulate NextOffset value. Thus if string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset smaller than NextOffset value then the patch is skipped (as that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// string was emitted earlier).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PatchTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> emitStringsImpl(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist">ArrayList&lt;PatchTy&gt;</a> &amp;StringPatches,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       uint64&#95;t &amp;NextOffset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;OutSection);</span></CodeLine>
